publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections.
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Tricia Marwick*, Nick Johnston*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Russell*

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-1695 St Andrews University Museums Award (lodged on 27 February 2001) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr David Davidson

S1M-1695 Mr Keith Harding: St Andrews University Museums Award—That the Parliament congratulates the University of St Andrews on being awarded Registered Museum status in recognition of its high standard of care for its collections, service to the public and management of its various museum collections. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tricia Marwick, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr David Davidson
